meta.name: The Price is Right at Night
meta.description: An audience full of previous contestants who had heart-wrenching losses get a second chance to win big; prizes include a trip to a private island in Belize, a 14-day cruise to Antarctica, a sailboat, new car, cash prizes and a home theater set.

videos.title: A Holiday Extravaganza with the Cast of SEAL Team
The Price is Right at Night: Primetime - RuPaul
Redemption
videos.overview: "Redemption" gives an audience full of previous contestants who had heart-wrenching losses a second chance to "come on down" and win big. Hoping history won't repeat itself, contestants play to win big prizes, including a trip to a private island in Belize, a 14-day cruise to Antarctica, a sailboat, new car, cash prizes, a home theater set and much, much more.

videos.title: Grocery Store Employees
videos.overview: Grocery store employees have their expert knowledge of product pricing put to the test. Contestants have a chance to win incredible prizes, including an Italian getaway, an all-inclusive Costa Rican retreat, a 17-ft boat, new cars and much more.

videos.title: Service Industry Workers
videos.overview: "Service Industry Workers" gives constants who work for gratuity a chance to win the biggest tips of their lives.

videos.title: Superfans
videos.overview: "Superfans" celebrates some of the show's most passionate and dedicated viewers. From a legacy contestant whose family members are such fans that she was named after a Barker Beauty, to those who have extensive memorabilia collections, this special is a thank you to the fans who continue to be a part of the show's historic run on network television. Prizes include a once-in-a-lifetime experience of dinner with Drew Carey, a trip to Switzerland and more.

videos.title: Family Night
videos.overview: An epic game night featuring teams of kids, parents and grandparents playing for chances to win prizes for the whole family including new cars, adventure-packed trips to Paris and Jamaica, an outdoor home theater setup, $100,000 in cash and more

videos.title: Fourth of July Tribute
videos.overview: Celebrating active-duty military, veterans and their families; The Band of The Golden West from Sacramento, Calif., performs with 16 talented and versatile airmen-musicians under the command of Lt. Col. Cristina Moore Urrutia.

videos.title: Bob Barker Studio Goodbye
videos.overview: Paying tribute to The Bob Barker Studio 33 during the show's final taping at that location.

videos.title: Survivor Superfans
videos.overview: Host Drew Carey welcomes SURVIVOR host and executive producer Jeff Probst in a special SURVIVOR-themed episode. An audience full of SURVIVOR superfans try to outwit, outplay and outlast each other for a chance to win big cash prizes. Contestants will also be surprised when Jeff reveals a SURVIVOR-themed twist during two classic games.

videos.title: Mother in laws
videos.overview: Games Include: "One Away", "Hot Seat", & "That's Too Much".

videos.title: Office Holiday Party
videos.overview: Get ready for a festive celebration as "The Price Is Right at Night" transforms into a lively "Holiday Office Party."

videos.title: College Students Home For The Holidays
Global Getaways
videos.overview: Pack your bags! The Price is Right at Night is taking you on an adventure around the globe, giving contestants a chance to win dream trips to all seven continents. Prizes include a cruise to Antarctica, a South African safari and vacations to Australia, New Zealand, South America, Norway and the Maldives. Filled with exciting moments, this episode includes some impressive wins by lucky players.

videos.title: Holiday Heroes
videos.overview: The #1 series in daytime returns to primetime with THE PRICE IS RIGHT AT NIGHT to celebrate those who serve our country year-round, airing Tuesday, Dec. 24 (9:00-10:00 PM, ET/PT) on the CBS Television Network. In a "Holiday Heroes" special episode, host Drew Carey invites first responders, firefighters, police officers and members of the military to "come on down!" to play for exciting family vacations, luxury cars and a cash prize of up to $250,000!.

videos.title: Jackpot: The Cash Is In The Bag
Jackpot: Go For the Hundred Grand
Jackpot: 100K Payday
videos.overview: The game Half Off is played for $100,000; the popular game Switcharoo gives a lucky contestant a chance to win a Porsche worth over $83,000; a twist on the classic Grocery Game gives a player the opportunity to win an extra $25,000.

videos.title: Supercharged Jackpot
videos.overview: The fan-favorite Race Game gives a player the opportunity to win a Ford Mustang; a contestant plays 3 Strikes for a Tesla Cybertruck worth over $100,000; a twist in the popular game Let 'Em Roll gives a player a chance to win up to $150,000.

videos.title: Jackpot: Shell Shocked
videos.overview: The popular Shell Game gives a player a chance to win up to $150,000; a contestant plays Grid Lock for a Porsche electric vehicle worth over $90,000.
